definitions.text: United States inventor of firearms (especially automatic pistols and repeating rifles and a machine gun called the Peacemaker) (1855-1926)
English poet and husband of Elizabeth Barrett Browning noted for his dramatic monologues (1812-1889)
English poet best remembered for love sonnets written to her husband Robert Browning (1806-1861)
cooking to a brown crispiness over a fire or on a grill
examples: proper toasting should brown both sides of a piece of bread

definitions.text: fry in a pan until it changes color
examples: brown the meat in the pan
the draught browned the leaves on the trees in the yard
